医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Archer 进一步增强生物芯片 gFET 设计以实现先进传感，并发送给商业代工合作伙伴Archer Materials Limited（“Archer”，“公司”）是一家推进量子计算和医疗诊断行业的半导体公司，它开发了下一代生物芯片制造技术，可以在单个石墨烯场效应晶体管（“gFET”）上更好地检测和控制疾病样本“） 设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Archer-further-enhances-biochip-gFET-design-for-advanced-sensing-and-sends-to-commercial-foundry-partner.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Archer-further-enhances-biochip-gFET-design-for-advanced-sensing-and-sends-to-commercial-foundry-partner.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91bbea70-84b3-465c-b590-70d4eea2423f Tue, 01 Aug 2023 03:59:00 -0400 Archer further enhances biochip gFET design for advanced sensing and sends to commercial foundry partner
微生物群、肠道健康与代谢综合征患病率相关肠道菌群与代谢紊乱之间的关系主要集中在BA代谢和免疫方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-microbiota-connection-gut-health-linked-to-metabolic-syndrome-prevalence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/The-microbiota-connection-gut-health-linked-to-metabolic-syndrome-prevalence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e30c6d29-6de7-4cbc-bd86-65d20b09c831 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 03:54:00 -0400 The microbiota connection, gut health linked to metabolic syndrome prevalence
新设备可在一分钟内检测出 COVID-19圣路易斯华盛顿大学的高级科学家本杰明·萨姆林博士向该大学研究人员设计的装置吹气。该设备是一种使用生物传感器的呼气测试，可以成为医生办公室使用的一种工具，用于快速诊断感染导致 COVID-19 的病毒的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-device-can-detect-COVID-19-in-less-than-a-minute.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-device-can-detect-COVID-19-in-less-than-a-minute.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eb26647-5695-4a63-96d8-dbe3052f78c7 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 01:00:00 -0400 New device can detect COVID-19 in less than a minute
确定了制造非天然氨基酸的新方法您体内的每种蛋白质均由 20 种相同的结构单元（称为氨基酸）组成。但仅仅因为大自然受限于有限的工具包，并不意味着人类无法扩展它。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-way-to-create-unnatural-amino-acids-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-way-to-create-unnatural-amino-acids-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7a6872d-2d19-48ff-98f4-6a9979d58370 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 00:20:53 -0400 New way to create unnatural amino acids identified
研究调查了原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民面临的严重健康问题一项具有里程碑意义的研究项目将在昆士兰州各地的原住民社区派遣卫生工作者，研究原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民家庭的长期福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-investigates-the-serious-health-issues-faced-by-Aboriginal-and-Torres-Strait-Islander-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-investigates-the-serious-health-issues-faced-by-Aboriginal-and-Torres-Strait-Islander-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb2da842-d322-429e-9505-47293f40697b Tue, 01 Aug 2023 00:01:46 -0400 Study investigates the serious health issues faced by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people
中国研究人员对100多种燕麦植物的基因组进行了测序就全球产量而言，燕麦是十大谷类作物之一。它可以适应不同的气候，即使在水稻和玉米等其他作物无法生长的恶劣环境下，农民也能成功种植它。然而，并非所有燕麦植物都是一样的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Chinese-researchers-sequence-the-genomes-of-over-100-oat-plants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Chinese-researchers-sequence-the-genomes-of-over-100-oat-plants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c760fdaf-19cd-4381-ab13-952eee89e1b7 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 23:55:11 -0400 Chinese researchers sequence the genomes of over 100 oat plants
发现攻击真菌感染的新方法RIKEN 可持续研究科学研究中心 (CSRS) 和多伦多大学的研究人员发现了一种治疗真菌感染的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/New-way-to-attack-fungal-infections-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/New-way-to-attack-fungal-infections-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b36928a-68c9-4623-842d-5a663b19f241 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 23:44:33 -0400 New way to attack fungal infections discovered
贫血：一个差异巨大的全球健康问题2021 年，贫血症影响了近 20 亿人，其中对女性的影响比对男性的影响更大。一项涵盖三十年全球贫血数据（1990-2021）的新研究显示了一幅复杂的图景，显示了几个关键因素如何影响男性、女性和儿童成功故事的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Anemia-A-global-health-problem-with-wide-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Anemia-A-global-health-problem-with-wide-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2052fccb-9902-4c4b-86df-d7be1c280e2f Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:35:00 -0400 Anemia: A global health problem with wide disparities
华大基因报告：泰国需采取紧急行动抗击宫颈癌根据玛希隆大学 (Mahidol University) 发表的一项研究，只有 28.5% 的泰国女性在存活率最高的第一期被诊断出宫颈癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/BGI-Genomics-report-Thailand-needs-to-take-urgent-action-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/BGI-Genomics-report-Thailand-needs-to-take-urgent-action-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70df08f3-5ea3-453c-a120-4cbc69eba574 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:32:00 -0400 BGI Genomics report: Thailand needs to take urgent action to combat cervical cancer
鉴定出两种新的 HPV+ 头颈癌亚型在美国，与人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 相关的头颈部癌症，即头颈鳞状细胞癌 (HNSCC) 病例正在迅速增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Two-new-subtypes-of-HPV2b-head-and-neck-cancers-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Two-new-subtypes-of-HPV2b-head-and-neck-cancers-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d19b727-ffb3-4a3f-9225-dacf818933d2 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:27:00 -0400 Two new subtypes of HPV+ head and neck cancers identified
